mapper.select: SELECT pc.pcategory, pc.pcno, pc.pcno_top FROM product_category pc JOIN product_category pc2 ON pc.pcno = pc2.pcno WHERE pc.pcno_top IS NULL
SELECT pc.pcategory, pc.pcno, pc.pcno_top FROM product_category pc JOIN product_category pc2 ON pc.pcno = pc2.pcno WHERE pc.pcno_top = #{pcno}

SELECT pd.pid, pd.porigin, pd.pcount, pd.pdetail, pd.pbname,pd.pbsmall, pd.pbdesc, pd.pname, pd.pprice, pd.pcno, pd.stag, pd.pdiscount, pd.ptitle ,pc.pcategory FROM products pd join product_category pc on pd.pcno =pc.pcno WHERE pd.pid=#{pid}
select pc.pcno, pc.pcategory, pc.pcno_top, pc2.pcategory as pcat from product_category pc join product_category pc2 on pc.pcno_top = pc2.pcno where pc.pcno_top=#{pcno}

select rownum, pa.pname, pa.pid, pa.pcno, pa.pprice, pa.pdiscount,pimg from ( select rownum ,pd.* from ( select pname, pprice, pcno, pdiscount,pid from products order by pdiscount desc) pd
) pa join product_img pdimg on pa.pid=pdimg.pid where pdepth =0 and rownum <=8
